name: Spooky Solitaire - Halloween Tripeaks
description:
Spooky Solitaire - Halloween Tripeaks is a card game developed by CYBERNAUTICA - Card Games For Free, Solitaire & 21.
Spooky Solitaire - Halloween Tripeaks is available on Android. The game is sold via Google Play.
